meanings.definition: The quality of being enormous in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The enormousness of the mountain took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The enormousness of the elephant amazed the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The enormousness of the cake made everyone's eyes widen in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The enormousness of the task ahead seemed insurmountable.
meanings.sent5: The enormousness of the waterfall made it a sight to remember.

meanings.definition: The state of being extremely large or huge.
meanings.sent1: The enormousness of the ocean was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The enormousness of the crowd at the concert was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The enormousness of the ice cream cone made it a challenge to finish.
meanings.sent4: The enormousness of the problem required a creative solution.
meanings.sent5: The enormousness of the tree's shadow provided relief from the sun.
